summary: Police inspector Léonetti, a tough, efficient policeman, has been sent to a second-rate police station after being reprimanded. There he is given a partner, young and beautiful Jeanne Dumas... See full summary »
cast: Lino Ventura|Marlène Jobert|Michel Constantin|Paul Crauchet|Alain Mottet|Béatrice Arnac|Guy Heron|Albert Dagnant|Monique Mélinand|Marcel Pérès|Germaine Delbat|Hervé Sand|Pascal Gillot|François Jaubert|Régine Lovi|Paul Beauvais|Aude Olivier|Philippe March|Mathilde Ceccarelli|Carlo Nell|Pippo Merisi|Luigi Cortese|Raymond Meunier|Jacques Marchand|Frédéric Santaya|Lucie Arnold|Robert Favart|Guy Kerner|Bianca Saury|Jean Sobieski|Gilette Barbier|Luc Bartholomé|Philippe Brizard|Michel Charrel|Roger Desmare|Max Desrau|Pierre Duncan|Martine Ferrière|Sébastien Floche|Pierre Frag|Jacques Galland|Suzy Hannier|Thadeus Huzielak|Stan Krol|Jacques Leroy|Sylvain Levignac|Roger Lumont|Rita Maiden|Serge Marquand|Colette Mars|Bernard Musson|Émile Riandreys|Jacques Richard|César Torres|Dominique Zardi
title: Último domicilio conocido
